name: Constants
description: This file contains all the constants used throughout the classes in the project.

constants.name: CHANCE_CARD
constants.description: Boolean choice 0 represents a chance card

constants.name: COMMUNITY_CHEST_CARD
constants.description: Boolean choice 1 represents a community chest card

constants.name: CHANCE_PER_HOUSE_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the chance building card per house built

constants.name: CHANCE_PER_HOTEL_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the chance building card per hotel built

constants.name: COMMUNITY_CHEST_PER_HOUSE_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the community chest building card per house built

constants.name: COMMUNITY_CHEST_PER_HOTEL_FEE
constants.description: Fee charged by the community chest building card per hotel built

constants.name: LMBDA_GET_OUT_OF_JAIL_FREE
constants.description: The lambda executed upon drawing the 'Get out of jail free' card'

constants.name: NUM_HOUSES_BEFORE_HOTEL
constants.description: The number of houses a Player must build before upgrading to a hotel

constants.name: NUM_HOUSES
constants.description: The total number of houses available on the market

constants.name: NUM_HOTELS
constants.description: The total number of hotels available on the market

constants.name: NUM_SQUARES
constants.description: The number of Squares on the board

constants.name: INDEX
constants.description: A dictionary that maps square names to their indices on the board
